title: Calories in Seedless Red Grapes
meta_description: Discover calories in seedless red grapes per 100g, including carbs, sugars, fiber, protein, fat, and quick serving tweaks for better nutrition tracking.
assumptions: Fresh, raw seedless red grapes, with skin, no added sugars or preservatives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, growing conditions, and storage; check labels for packaged grapes when available.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of seedless red grapes provides ~69 kcal, mostly from natural sugars and carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: With 1 oz cheddar cheese per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g seedless red grapes?
Are seedless red grapes high in sugar?
faqs.a: They contain ~15.5 g natural sugars per 100 g, mainly fructose.

faqs.q: What's the fiber content in seedless red grapes?
faqs.a: Approximately 0.9 g dietary fiber per 100 g, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Do seedless red grapes have fat or protein?
faqs.a: Very low: 0.2 g fat and 0.7 g protein per 100 g.

faqs.q: How do calories compare in red vs green grapes?
faqs.a: Similar; both around 69 kcal per 100 g, with minor variations in antioxidants.
